about_the_game:
Explore the underground system, find clues as to the many disappearances down below.

Use the seeing tool to find hidden messages and invisible tools to open up the underground.

However, a killing machine is thirsty for bloodshed and you are the nearest target.

Hide from the mechanical beast in order to not be the next victim in his blood pool.

Alex Jones is exploring an abandoned sewer system, said to have many disappearances from there, only to discover that souls remain in the system.
Abigail, one of the souls, helps Alex get through the system only to discover the thing that killed all the souls is lurking within the sewers.
You must go through and escape the underground sewers and escape from the mechanical, killing machine that hunts you down.
